text:
Using mod_proxy_fcgi for serving php content (php-fpm) and getting a lot of header read errros.
This is causing funny effect - html is displayed partally with "Service Unavailable. This server is temporarily unable to ..." at the very end.
Backend server is working fine - awaiting queries.


[Wed Jan 29 20:27:37.581931 2014] [proxy_fcgi:error] [pid 52367:tid 34706843680] [client xxxxxxxxx:58261] AH01067: Failed to read entire header got 7 wanted 8

[Wed Jan 29 20:27:37.581943 2014] [proxy_fcgi:error] [pid 52367:tid 34706843680] (22)Invalid argument: [client xxxxxxxxx:58261] AH01075: Error dispatching request to :

[Wed Jan 29 20:27:43.383681 2014] [proxy_fcgi:error] [pid 10483:tid 34706852480] [client xxxxxxxxx:58507] AH01067: Failed to read entire header got 7 wanted 8

[Wed Jan 29 20:27:43.383706 2014] [proxy_fcgi:error] [pid 10483:tid 34706852480] (22)Invalid argument: [client xxxxxxxxx:58507] AH01075: Error dispatching request to :

[Wed Jan 29 20:27:45.515103 2014] [proxy_fcgi:error] [pid 10483:tid 34706846480] [client xxxxxxxxx:58551] AH01067: Failed to read entire header got 7 wanted 8

[Wed Jan 29 20:27:45.515121 2014] [proxy_fcgi:error] [pid 10483:tid 34706846480] (22)Invalid argument: [client xxxxxxxxx:58551] AH01075: Error dispatching request to :
creator: admin@3dr.org
trawick@apache.org
text:
Please retest with httpd 2.4.7, which includes the following fix specific to the error being logged in your server:

mod_proxy_fcgi: Handle reading protocol data that is split between packets.
